[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
 

Hujjaj Travel & Tours (Pvt) Ltd.


Office No. 202, Business Centre Frere Road Karachi.
Phone : 021- 111 48 55 25 - 0304 11 11 786
Govt. Licence No. 1693
NTN : 2456669-1 / SaleTax No. : 2456669-1
  
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
  Tour Invoice  
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
CUSTOMER NAME & ADDRESS:   Booking No.
Package Title
Guest Name
Care Of
Address
Contact No
Sales Staff		   Date
Status		  

Visa
  Adult Child Infant Days
Qty : 0 0 0 0
Ticket
  Adult Child Infant   Departure Arrival Airline
Qty : 0 0 0        
Class :   Sectors:  

Accomodation
Hotel Name City Room Type Check In Check Out Ngt Status Includes
               

Documents
Name Required Received Balance
       
Transportation
Vehicle Sector/Route
   

Package Per Adult :   Per Child :   Per Infant :  
Ticket Per Adult :   Per Child :   Per Infant :  
AMOUNT IN WORDS :
Package Total :  
Ticket Total  
Optional Total  
Net Total : Pkr  

Prepared By :  

FOR HUJJAJ TRAVEL & TOURS (PVT) LTD


1) All above rates are on per person basis without meals.
2) All above packages and transportation are non-refundable for any reason.
3) Ticket & Ziarat is not included in package.
4) Packages & Ticket rates are subject to change without any prior Notice.
5) Room’s availability is subject to confirmation.
6) Visa rejection or cancellation will be charged as per policy.
7) Payment mode will be 50% Advance and 50% at the time of delivery of the passport.
8) Child will be charged full in sharing package .
9) One child can be accommodated in parents room Ticket, Visa & Transport will be charged.
10) All passengers should 100% return back, if passengers overstay or escape in the Kingdom of KSA then the penalties levied by the Hajj MOH KSA will be charged to the parties accordingly.
11) Extra fees of SAR 2,000/- per head for repeat Umrah will be apply as per Saudi MOH Policy.
12) While all our efforts will be made to meet passenger requirements, sometimes an alternate hotel or type of room may have to be offered & any rate differences will be settled accordingly.
13) Any penalty charges will be charged as per Airlines Policy for Ticket refund, change of Airline, Change of dates, ticket voidation and No-Show on confirm seats.
14) The total number of days stay in KSA will be as per selected package & extension will be allowed only if hotel is booked through local Agent.
15) In any circumstances pilgrim will not be allowed to stay in Kingdom on his own arrangements.
16) Procedural Terms & Conditions are subject to change without prior notice, which depends upon Saudi & Pakistani rules & regulations.
17) Once the visa is issued, stamped passport will not be given back unless package booked or visa expires & after approval of ticket refund obtained from concerned Airline.
18) If pilgrims travel without information we will not responsible for any incident or detention by Saudi Authorities.
19) In case of change in airfare / taxes, pilgrim will pay the actual difference before departure. And further airfare of the traveling date and available class will be applicable.
20) Hujjaj Travel & Tours (Pvt) Ltd., has the rights to accept or reject any application without any reason.
21) In any circumstances our agency is not responsible for natural disaster, theft, riot strike civil commotion or terrorism of documents required in Umrah traveling.
22) Hujjaj Travel & Tours (Pvt) Ltd. will not be responsible for rejection or delay of umrah visa.
23) Approval of visa will remain valid till 07 days from the date of receiving from MOH KSA including Holidays.
24) In case of any V.A.T will be issue by saudi authorized law will be charged.

"}]
